# List of protected heritage sites in Tournai

This table shows an overview of the protected heritage sites in the Walloon city of Tournai listed as part of Belgium's national heritage.
|}
See also
* List of protected heritage sites in Hainaut (province)
* Tournai
References
* Belgian heritage register: Direction générale opérationnelle - Aménagement du territoire, Logement, Patrimoine et Energie (DG4)[http://lampspw.wallonie.be/dgo4/site_thema/index.php]
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20110809000421/http://www.dglive.be/desktopdefault.aspx/tabid-2740/ www.dglive.be]
